actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 by striking out the provision which grants Members of Congress special treatment with respect to living expense deductions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the special provisions allowing Members of Congress an increased living expense deduction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 by striking out the provision which grants Members of Congress special treatment with respect to living expense deductions.
